## Installation

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Snape-max/imagecat.git
cd imagecat
python install .
```

or

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/Snape-max/imgcat.git
```


## Requirements

- Python 3.6+
- Pillow for image reading


## Usage

```bash
imgcat <image_path>
```
